name: Vocitus
description:
Vocitus is an atmospheric  first-person puzzle short game where is your objective is to solve puzzles to explore ruins left by an ancient civilization in the hope to discover their secret.

Currently, this game is really short and I focused more on the visuals and it doesn't have a story yet and I hope I can turn it into a full game someday but I thought I should gather feedback and try to fund a little bit of it so I can hire a good writer and some help.

Please give it a try and donate if you want(so I can have time to create more games! or actually push this and make a full game out of it ) or say something about it on social media so everyone can try it.

Please follow me on Twitter:@Abdulazizalnag 

The beautiful UI  design is by:

Anas Al Sajwan

Please follow him on Twitter: @AnasAlSajwan.
